DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Anatomic Site OMOP CDM Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:A coded value specifying the anatomic site(s) or system.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A coded value specifying the anatomic site(s) or system._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP Common Data Model Biospecimen Anatomic Site Code
